Message:
That day was shortly after
my master and I had first met.

We had passed a small village
decorated with colorful flowers
of all sorts, and stopped to see
what was happening there.

Flowers truly are strange things.
Just the sight of them brings
smiles to people’s faces.

The village was full of
their lovely floral scents.

Thanks to that, that day felt like
the very image of spring itself.

Master may have been the Duke,
but he was having as much
fun there as though he were just
another member of the village.

I only learned that this was
called a “flower festival”
after the festivities had ended.

On our way home,
my master told me...

“This village is nice, isn’t it?
Here they grow flowers
instead of crops.
They say it’s to bring
smiles to people’s faces.

Someday, I want to make
the entire Duchy just like
this village.”
